titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 365) to make a technical amendment to the Education Sciences Reform Act of 2002.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-190, by Mr. Dreier.

The amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted. All points of order against provisions in the bill, as amended, are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 65.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 384.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 242 - 184 (Roll no. 686).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 249 - 178 (Roll no. 687).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 8/1/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (S. 365) to make a technical amendment to the Education Sciences Reform Act of 2002.
